channel.title: Click---> Project Sony Version 2 [Hyperion]
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]The Story[/size][/center] [center]Hey guys so im just going to cut to the chase after workin on project Sony with Baslem it turned to a great success we had a fair bit of players (30) then i realeased the server on Moparscape and got 8.7k views out of it unsure what downloads since it was uploaded to a Multiuploader so i few months on im feeling like i wanna make a server so i thought im going to use Hyperion as a base since its stable.... so now im here requesting a team of Brill coders.[/center] [center][size=18pt]The Base[/size] Scrolling thought the [R-S] Forums and i found a hyperion server Blank #317 with the client so i thought yup thats gunna be the base[/center] [center][size=18pt]Client Base[/size] Ok well as i said at the top the server came with the client so i guess the client is a hyperion client 459 gameframe[/center] [center][size=18pt]Extra infomation[/size] Ok im going to be onest here i have no clue about hyperion and it will be a positive server im gunna learn my best at hyperion i got told it is better than Riotscape for Stableabillity allthought riotscape has the bettter combat that is somthing we will have to achieve.[/center] [b][center][size=24pt] Main Features[/size][/center] [center][size=14pt]Colour codes - Red - Orange - Green[/size][/center] [center][size=14pt]- Combat System - 0% - Woodcutting - 80% Came with the server - Fishing - N/A - Unsure if its allrady done - Mining - 35% - Works but not 100% - Herblore - 0% - not started - Eating - 10% - packed with the sever - Smithing - 0% - Farming - 0% - Theving - 50% - Rcing - 0% - Crafting - 0% - Shops - 0% - Fletch - 0% - Slayers - 0% - Firemaking - 0% - Preyer - 0% - Sound Effects - 80% - Came with the client i might remove... - Website - 0% - Forums - 0% - Player rendering - 100% - PlayerTalking - 100% - Minigames - 0%[/size][/center] [center][size=14pt]- Item dropping 50% dosent appear on the ground easy fix[/size][/center] [center][size=18pt]Client Features[/size][/center] [center]So the client is basicly a 317 client it has nothing but a 317 gameframe and a cache[/center] [center][size=18pt]Pictures/Videos[/size] Well dont be like PICTURE PICTURES becuase there wont be much like i said this is blank![/center] [img]http://img838.imageshack.us/img838/2534/screenshotstudiocapture.jpg[/img] [center]Proof of it logging in and talking[/center] [center][img]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/8571/screenshotstudiocapturey.jpg[/img][/center] [center] [img]http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/6332/screenshotstudiocaptureh.jpg[/img] Yelling command 100% working thanks to Shamon King[/center] [size=14pt][center]http://yfrog.com/87clip0004z[/center][/size] Application
Name: Age: Email: Spot: How long have you beening writing java:
Spots avaliable Website Main page Coders Client coders mySQL + PhP (highscores i may just do it my self) Beta test unavaliable theres nothing to beta test yet so dont apply for it! [center][center][size=18pt]The Team[/size][/center] Coder - teh skilla[/center] [center][size=18pt]Update log[/size][/center] [center]- added stalls to theving Credits to fire capes[/center][center] - Yell command added [/center] [center]- 50% dropping [/center] [center]- Runecrafting has been added[/center]

item.title: Click---> Project Sony Version 2 [Hyperion]
item.dc:creator: @Infinity_Zr Infinity Zr
item.description:
@Infinity_Zr wrote:

Primadude:

That’s a 459 gameframe, not a 317 one. A 317 gameframe has the older side-icons, older compass image and the black line running down the right edge of the game screen :P.

Thanks[quote=“mandood77, post:10, topic:351672”]gl man! if you want, put me on hold for beta testing once its available! =P[/quote]

sure i will

Read full topic

item.title: Click---> Project Sony Version 2 [Hyperion]
item.dc:creator: @Infinity_Zr Infinity Zr
item.description:
@Infinity_Zr wrote:

[center][size=18pt]The Story[/size][/center]

[center]Hey guys so im just going to cut to the chase after workin on project Sony with Baslem it turned to a great success we had a fair bit of players (30) then i realeased the server on Moparscape and got 8.7k views out of it unsure what downloads since it was uploaded to a Multiuploader so i few months on im feeling like i wanna make a server so i thought im going to use Hyperion as a base since its stable… so now im here requesting a team of Brill coders.[/center]

[center][size=18pt]The Base[/size]
Scrolling thought the [R-S] Forums and i found a hyperion server Blank #317
with the client so i thought yup thats gunna be the base[/center]

[center][size=18pt]Client Base[/size]
Ok well as i said at the top the server came with the client so i guess the client is a hyperion client 459 gameframe[/center]

[center][size=18pt]Extra infomation[/size]
Ok im going to be onest here i have no clue about hyperion and it will be a positive server im gunna learn my best at hyperion i got told it is better than Riotscape for Stableabillity allthought riotscape has the bettter combat that is somthing we will have to achieve.[/center]
[b][center][size=24pt]
Main Features[/size][/center]

[center][size=14pt]Colour codes

  • Red
  • Orange
  • Green[/size][/center]

[center][size=14pt]- Combat System - 0%

  • Woodcutting - 80% Came with the server
  • Fishing - N/A - Unsure if its allrady done
  • Mining - 35% - Works but not 100%
  • Herblore - 0% - not started
  • Eating - 10% - packed with the sever
  • Smithing - 0%
  • Farming - 0%
  • Theving - 50%
  • Rcing - 0%
  • Crafting - 0%
  • Shops - 0%
  • Fletch - 0%
  • Slayers - 0%
  • Firemaking - 0%
  • Preyer - 0%
  • Sound Effects - 80% - Came with the client i might remove…
  • Website - 0%
  • Forums - 0%
  • Player rendering - 100%
  • PlayerTalking - 100%
  • Minigames - 0%[/size][/center]
    [center][size=14pt]- Item dropping 50% dosent appear on the ground easy fix[/size][/center]

[center][size=18pt]Client Features[/size][/center]
[center]So the client is basicly a 317 client it has nothing but a 317 gameframe and a cache[/center]

[center][size=18pt]Pictures/Videos[/size]
Well dont be like PICTURE PICTURES becuase there wont be much like i said this is blank![/center]
[center]Proof of it logging in and talking[/center]
[center][/center]
[center]

Yelling command 100% working thanks to Shamon King[/center]
[size=14pt][center]http://yfrog.com/87clip0004z[/center][/size]

Application

mySQL + PhP (highscores i may just do it my self)
Beta test unavaliable theres nothing to beta test yet so dont apply for it!

[center][size=18pt]Update log[/size][/center]

    [/center]
